title: WATCH: Jennifer Aniston admits to having stalked people using a secret Instagram account
text:
Cape Town - Jennifer Aniston broke Instagram after she opened her first official account – or was it her first?

The former Friends actress who temporarily crashed Instagram earlier this week after joining the app with a post of her ’90s sitcom cast mates, admitted to having an account she used to stalk people, E News reported.

During a recent interview on Jimmy Kimmel Live!, Jennifer told the show’s host she had a stalker account that she used to figure out the app.

“Well, it was a stalker account, yes,” she revealed to Jimmy.

“When I was thinking about doing this, I sort of figured it was time to kind of understand the world and dip my toe into the sort of social media pool.”

Since joining the app the 50-year-old actress, broke Prince Harry and Meghan’s followers’ record in just five hours and one minute and garnered one million followers, The Sun reported.

Watch Jennifer’s full confession below and what content we can look forward to seeing on her page – which is more Friends reunion selfies, we hope.
